remarks: The integral for simple functions is itself a function.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Feb-2018.)
statement:

sitgval.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. U. ran measures ) $.
sitgf.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ f e. dom ( W sitg M ) ) -> ( ( W sitg M ) ` f ) e. B ) $.
